argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringneglmul.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringneglmul.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ringneglmul.n | |- N = ( invg ` R ) |
| 4 |  | ringneglmul.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 5 |  | ringneglmul.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | ringneglmul.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_grpinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ Y e. B ) -> ( N ` Y ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 8, 6, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` Y ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10 | #P_ringmneg1 | |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` X ) .x. ( N ` Y ) ) = ( N ` ( X .x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_ringmneg2 | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. ( N ` Y ) ) = ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( X .x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) = ( N ` ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2 | #P_ringcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) |
| 15 | 4, 5, 6, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) |
| 16 | 1, 3 | #P_grpinvinv | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) -> ( N ` ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) ) = ( X .x. Y ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 15, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) ) = ( X .x. Y ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 13, 17 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` X ) .x. ( N ` Y ) ) = ( X .x. Y ) ) |
